description: Welcome to Heathercrest, a gated, parklike community in Burnaby’s Oaklands, just steps to Deer Lake Park. This spacious 3 bed, 2.5 bath townhome offers 1,885 sq ft across 3 levels w/ 9’ ceilings, a large living room, formal dining, family room, kitchen, and eating area. The main floor opens to a private patio backing onto greenery at the edge of the complex for added privacy. There are 3 bedrooms upstairs, including a generous primary with walk-in closet and ensuite. Downstairs feat a large rec room (optional 4th bedroom), laundry, storage, and a private 2-car garage. Well-managed, pet-friendly complex. A/C allowed w/approval. Min to Metrotown, SkyTrain, parks. School catchment for Marlborough Elementary (French Im) & Burnaby Central. OPEN HOUSE SAT OCT 4th 12:00-2:00
